member.name: M:StorageHelper.Windows8.Storage.SaveAsync(Windows.Storage.StorageFolder,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Saves an entry with the provided path and value to the application's persisted specified storage.
member.param: The path for the entry to save.
member.returns: True if the entry has been saved.

member.name: M:StorageHelper.Windows8.Storage.LoadAsync``1(Windows.Storage.StorageFolder,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with the specified path from the application's persisted specified storage.
member.typeparam: The type of the object at the specified path.
member.param: The path for the entry to retrieve.
member.returns: The retrieved element or an empty object of type T if no entry was found at the specified path.

member.name: M:StorageHelper.Windows8.Storage.DeleteAsync(Windows.Storage.StorageFolder,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the entry with the specified path from the application's persisted specified storage.
member.param: The path for the entry to remove.
member.returns: True if the entry has been removed.
